text:
The first trailer of the inspirational animated film "Soul" was released from the creators of "Up" and "Puzzle"
07 Nov 2019, 15:10 by Daria Gromova
"Do not exchange life for all sorts of nonsense."
Disney and Pixar showed the first trailer for the new full-length animated film Soul. He talks about Joe Gardner, a school music teacher who dreams of playing jazz. Judging by the trailer, at the moment when he finally made an important step on the road to a dream, an accident occurs, and his soul separates from the body.



The director of the picture is Pete Docter, who worked on the legendary animated cartoons of Pixar Studios - including Puzzle, Up and Monster Corporation. Heroes were voiced by Jamie Foxx (singer and actor, best known for his role in ‚ÄúDjango Unchained‚Äù), Tina Fey, Filisia Rashad and others.
In Russia, the premiere will take place on June 18, 2020.
